data.meta_description: Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq, popularly known as Ojopagogo, is a respected Nigerian actor and television host who is also recognized for…
data.text:
Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq, popularly known as Ojopagogo, is a respected Nigerian actor and television host who is also recognized for his filmmaking skills.

He is married to Mojii Afolayan, an actress from Nigeria.

Profile

Full Name: Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq

Stage Name: Ojopagogo

Born: September 30, 1964

Age: 60 years old.

Birthplace: Iselin, Oyo, Nigeria

Nationality: Nigerian

Occupation: Actor and Film Producer

Height: N/A

Parents: N/A

Siblings: N/A

Spouse: Moji Afolayan

Children: 3

Relationship: Married

Net Worth: $5million

Early Life

Olayiwola Olasunkanmi Razaq, known as Ojopagogo, is a renowned Nigerian actor and television presenter.

He was born on September 30, 1964, in the rural town of Iseyin in Oyo state. Information about his parents and siblings is not publicly disclosed. Thus, details about his early life still need to be made available.

Education

Rasaq Olayiwola, also known as Ojopagogo, attended St. Patrick’s Primary School in Oke-Ado, Ibadan, and Community High School in Apete, Ibadan, for his primary and secondary education, respectively.

Although details about his tertiary education are scarce, Ojopagogo’s commitment and passion for acting have been evident throughout his career.

Career

Rasaq Olayiwola, also known as Ojopagogo, has had a diverse and successful career in the Nigerian entertainment sector.

Noted for his versatility, he has demonstrated his acting skills in various Yoruba films since the late 1980s, impressing audiences with his ability to portray a wide range of characters effectively in comedic and serious roles.

Ojopagogo is recognized for his exceptional comedic skills. With perfect timing and effortless humor, he wins over audiences in Yoruba cinema.

Besides acting, Ojopagogo has explored directing, helming numerous Yoruba films that showcase his distinctive storytelling style and creative vision.

Ojopagogo has also stepped into film production, lending his knowledge and proficiency to the success of various Yoruba movie projects.

Ojopagogo has been acknowledged and honored for his significant impact on the Nigerian entertainment sector throughout his career. His colleagues esteem him, and he has garnered a loyal following who appreciate his skills and hard work.

Ojopagogo’s career reflects his love for narrating stories and his pledge to captivate viewers with his acting. He remains a key figure in Yoruba cinema, creating a lasting influence on the Nigerian entertainment scene.

Social Media

Instagram handle: @OjopagogoTv

Facebook handle: Ojopagogo Tv

Twitter handle: N/A

Personal Life

Rasaq Olayiwola, who goes by the stage name Ojopagogo, is wedded to actress Moji Afolayan. They first connected on a film set over 15 years ago and tied the knot in December 2004.

Despite their privacy preference, the couple has disclosed that their strong faith plays a key role in their enduring marriage. They are parents to three children.

Net Worth

Rasaq Olayiwola, also known as Ojopagogo, has accumulated a net worth of $5 million, demonstrating impressive financial success.
